casebody.data:
EASTWAY WRECKER SERVICE
v.
CHARLOTTE. No. 467A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2005. Thomas L. Odom, Jr., for Eastway Wrecker Service. Cynthia White, Senior Assistant City Attorney, S. Jujeeb Shah-Khan, Assistant City Attorney, for City of Charlotte.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to Serve and File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Eastway Wrecker Service) shall have up to and including the 20th day of September 2005 to file and serve his/her reply brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of September 2005."
